metadata.title: CVE-2024-26642 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: disallow anonymous set with timeout flag Anonymoussets are never used with timeout from userspace, reject this. Exception tothis rule is NFT_SET_EVAL to ensure legacy meters still work.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-44.44').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1023.23').
linux-azure package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1024.25').
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1024.26').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1019.22').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-44.44.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1026.26').
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1020.23').
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1017.18').
